```{python}
#| skip: true
#| echo: false

output = display

import htmltools
# Needed for serializing static HTML dependencies to JSON
htmltools.html_dependency_render_mode = "json"
```


```{python}
from shiny import render, reactive, ui

ui.input_text("txt", "Input some text:", value="Hello, Quarto + Shiny!")
```

```{python}
@output
@render.text
def foo():
    return f"The input text is: { input.txt() }"
```


```{python}
ui.input_slider("static_slider", "Static slider", 0, 10, 5)
```


```{python}
@output
@render.text
def static_slider_value():
    return f"The static slider value is: { input.static_slider() }"
```



```{python}
@output
@render.ui
def dyn_date_ui():
    return ui.input_date("dyn_date", "Dynamic date", value = "2023-10-03")

ui.output_ui("dyn_date")
```
